alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:19AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS AND WEST CENTRAL LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 AM CDT... At 319 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whiteface Reservoir, to 6 miles south of Wolf Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairbanks, Wolf Lake, Brimson, Highland Lake, Thomas Lake Near Brimson, Whiteface Reservoir, Wales, Bassett Lake, and Pequaywan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
